Class Upgrade

java.lang.Object
logic.item.BaseItem
logic.item.Upgrade
All Implemented Interfaces:
Buyable, Upgradeable
public class Upgrade extends BaseItem implements Upgradeable
Represents an item that increases click power.

  • Constructor Details

    • Upgrade

      public Upgrade(String name, double cost, double clickMultiplier, int maxLevel, String imagePath)
      Initialize the upgrade.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the upgrade
      cost - the cost of the upgrade
      clickMultiplier - the multiplier applied to click power
      maxLevel - the maximum level of the upgrade
      imagePath - the image path for the upgrade

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(GameManager gameManager)
      Multiplies the game's current click power by clickMultiplier and updates it. Adds self to upgrades list.
      Specified by:
      applyEffect in class BaseItem
      Parameters:
      gameManager - the game manager instance

    • getMaxLevel

      Return max level.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      the maximum level

    • isMaxLevel

      public boolean isMaxLevel(int currentLevel)
      Return true if currentLevel = maxLevel.
      Specified by:
      isMaxLevel in interface Upgradeable
      Parameters:
      currentLevel - the current level to check
      Returns:
      true if max level is reached
